name: Classic Pancakes
long_desc: Delicious fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and a side of fresh berries. Perfect for a sweet start to your day.

name: Breakfast Sandwich
short_desc: Toasted sandwich with scrambled eggs, cheese, and bacon on a brioche bun.

name: Avocado Toast
long_desc: Crunchy toasted sourdough bread topped with creamy avocado, a sprinkle of salt, pepper, and a dash of lemon juice.

name: Omelette
long_desc: A fluffy omelette filled with cheddar cheese, diced tomatoes, and spinach. Served with a side of toast and hash browns.

name: Smoothie Bowl
long_desc: A refreshing bowl of blended fruit smoothie topped with granola, fresh berries, banana slices, and a drizzle of honey.

name: Bagel with Cream Cheese
long_desc: A freshly toasted bagel with a generous spread of cream cheese. Choose from plain, sesame, or everything bagels.

name: French Toast
long_desc: Golden brown French toast slices dusted with cinnamon sugar, served with maple syrup and a side of fresh fruit.

name: Breakfast Burrito
long_desc: A hearty burrito filled with scrambled eggs, sausage, cheddar cheese, and salsa. Served with a side of sour cream.

name: Granola Parfait
long_desc: Layers of creamy yogurt, crunchy granola, and fresh berries. A light and healthy way to start your day.

name: Caesar Salad
long_desc: A classic Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Add grilled chicken for a heartier meal.

name: Grilled Chicken Burger
short_desc: Grilled chicken on a brioche bun
long_desc: Juicy grilled chicken breast served on a brioche bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy aioli sauce. Comes with a side of fries.

name: Margherita Pizza
long_desc: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves on a thin, crispy crust.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
long_desc: A wrap filled with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Served with a side of potato chips.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
long_desc: A warm and creamy tomato basil soup served with a side of garlic bread. Perfect for a light and comforting meal.

name: BLT Sandwich
long_desc: A classic BLT sandwich with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes on toasted whole grain bread. Served with a pickle spear.

name: Tuna Salad
long_desc: A light and refreshing tuna salad made with celery, red onions, and a hint of lemon. Served on a bed of mixed greens.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
long_desc: A medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy sauce with garlic and ginger. Served with steamed jasmine rice.

name: Fish Tacos
long_desc: Three soft tacos filled with grilled fish, fresh salsa, shredded cabbage, and a drizzle of lime crema. Served with a side of chips.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
long_desc: Spaghetti topped with a rich and flavorful Bolognese sauce made from ground beef, tomatoes, and Italian herbs. Served with garlic bread.

name: Steak Frites
long_desc: A succulent grilled steak cooked to your liking, served with a side of crispy French fries and a fresh garden salad.

name: Sushi Platter
long_desc: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including salmon, tuna, and vegetarian options. Served with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Tandoori Chicken
long_desc: Chicken marinated in a blend of yogurt and spices, then grilled to perfection. Served with naan bread and a side of mint chutney.

name: Beef Stroganoff
long_desc: Tender strips of beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce, served over egg noodles. A comforting and hearty meal.

name: Chicken Alfredo
long_desc: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken and Parmesan cheese. Served with garlic bread.

name: Shrimp Scampi
long_desc: Succulent shrimp saut√©ed in a garlic butter sauce with a hint of lemon, served over a bed of linguine pasta.

name: Vegetable Curry
long_desc: A flavorful curry made with a variety of fresh vegetables, simmered in a rich and spicy sauce. Served with basmati rice.

name: BBQ Ribs
long_desc: Tender, fall-off-the-bone ribs smothered in a smoky barbecue sauce. Served with coleslaw and cornbread.

name: Chocolate Cake
short_desc: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.

name: Blueberry Cheesecake
short_desc: Creamy cheesecake with a fresh blueberry topping.

name: Tiramisu
short_desc: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
short_desc: Fluffy cake topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberries.

name: Macarons
short_desc: Assorted French macarons in a variety of flavors.

name: Apple Pie
short_desc: Classic apple pie with a flaky crust and spiced apple filling.
